com.viaoa.util
Class OAProperties

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
          java.util.Properties
              com.viaoa.util.OAProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
public class OAProperties
extends java.util.Properties
implements java.io.Serializable

Subclass of java.util.Properties where all "names" for name/value pairs are case insensitive.
NOTE: All name/value pairs are converted to Strings.

This can be used for working with *.ini files.

See Also:
Serialized Form

getInt

public int getInt(java.lang.String name)
Returns a property that is converted to an "int". If name/value does not exist, or not a number, then -1 is returned.

Parameters:
name - is name of property and is not case sensitive.

getInt

public int getInt(java.lang.String name,
                  int iDefault)
Returns a property that is converted to an "int". If name/value does not exist, then iDefault is returned. if value is not a number, then -1 is returned.

Parameters:
name - is name of property and is not case sensitive.

getString
